Posts.Content: Jul 30, 2011 07:48AM farmgirl24 wrote: I'm very glad to hear that your doctor is pursuing this so agressively! It's scary, but it's much better than having your doctors brush you off and potentially missing something bad going on. Will keep you in prayers that it's not cancer and hope that you get good news on Tuesday!
